name: Tigris Templum
description:
Note: Play on fullscreen for the best experience!

Tigris Templum is an experience back through time. If Romans had a secret trainingfacility how would it look like? Explore and find out!

Do you have what it takes to gain entry to Tigris Templum?

This project is fully made in Unity by me using Probuilder.

Music by: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=USz9cwVSaqg
